price: Basi siku hiyo hataadhibu yeyote namna ya kuadhibu kwake.
footnotes: Siku hiyo zitakuwa hali hizi, haadhibu mtu kama adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu, wala hafungi mtu kama afungavyo Yeye.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
